title: Customization nanoscale interfacial solvation structure for low-temperature lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01463D, Paper
Nan Li, Kun Gao, Ke Fan, Li Ma, Zihao Li, Baoluo He, Chao Shen, Qian Ye, Keyu Xie, Haitao Huang
We use PMETAC polymer brushes to regulate the nanoscale interfacial solvation structure for stable SEI in different electrolytes and at low service temperatures, supporting industrial scale manufacturing of Ah-level anode-free Li metal pouch cells.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
